programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A British diplomat in Kenya takes charge of the investigation into the murder of his wife, who had published an article highly critical of the money-making collusion between the High Commission and a pharmaceutical manufacturer. Fernando Meirelles' political thriller, based on John le Carre's novel, with Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: 10 Cent Pistol
programme.desc: A pair of low-life criminal brothers target the powerful LA mobster who left one of them rotting in prison. Crime caper, starring Jena Malone and Joe Mantegna.

programme.title: Two Down
programme.desc: A web of deceit unfolds and an unlikely alliance is formed when a young woman and a local delivery boy are taken hostage by an injured hitman. Comedy thriller, starring Conleth Hill, Alex Hassell and Tori Butler Hart.

programme.title: Broken Vows
programme.desc: A troubled, charming man spirals into a rage after being rejected by the engaged woman he seduced during a one night stand. Thriller, starring Wes Bentley, Jaimie Alexander and Cam Gigandet.

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers take shelter from a storm in a remote hotel, but start to suspect their being together at the same place and time is more than just a coincidence. Before long a mysterious figure begins to murder them off one by one - leaving the guests to work out which of them is the killer, or if someone else is in the hotel. Murder mystery, starring John Cusack, Ray Liotta, Amanda Peet and Alfred Molina.

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers take shelter from a storm in a remote hotel, but start to suspect their being together at the same place and time is more than just a coincidence. Before long a mysterious figure begins to murder them off one by one - leaving the guests to work out which of them is the killer, or if someone else is in the hotel. Murder mystery, starring John Cusack, Ray Liotta, Amanda Peet and Alfred Molina.

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the day's takings from the city's subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: A down-at-heel waitress vows to bring to justice the gang who raped her in a small-town bar - but is shocked when her attackers are given a light sentence. Determined not to be beaten, she persuades the district attorney to prosecute the men who watched the attack but did nothing to stop it. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Jodie Foster, with Kelly McGillis, Bernie Coulson, Leo Rossi and Woody Brown.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Let Me Make You a Martyr
programme.desc: Two siblings hatch a plan to take out their father, only for him to put a hitman on their tail. Revenge drama, starring Mark Boone Junior, Marilyn Manson and Sam Quartin.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: FBI agent Gretchen Blair finds herself caught in the middle of an elaborate mid-air heist. Thriller, starring Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren and Chuck Liddell.

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode.

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A Canadian surfer on holiday in Colombia falls in love with a local girl, only to discover to his horror that her uncle is the notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. He finds himself forced to become part of Escobar's family business, putting his life on the line as he faces the dangerous reality of the international cocaine trade. Thriller, starring Benicio Del Toro and Josh Hutcherson.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.

programme.title: City of Tiny Lights
programme.desc: A hard-drinking private detective searches for a missing sex worker, leading to a dangerous world of religious fanaticism and political intrigue. London-set crime thriller from Dredd director Pete Travis, starring Riz Ahmed, Billie Piper and James Floyd.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.

programme.title: The Juror
programme.desc: A mobster threatens to have a juror's son murdered if she fails to persuade the other 11 members of the jury to return a verdict of not guilty in the trial of a Mafia kingpin. Psychological thriller, starring Demi Moore, Alec Baldwin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, James Gandolfini and Anne Heche.

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone.(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: Teenagers Casey and Jonas discover love while on the run, but her corrupt and abusive cop dad isn't far behind. Thriller, starring Sophie Nelisse, Josh Wiggins and Bill Paxton.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko.(n)

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: A desperate father is blackmailed into helping a criminal gang evade a corrupt police chief. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen and Ty Shelton.(n)

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.(n)

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.(n)

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: A cynical lawyer plans to boost his public profile by defending an altar boy who stands accused of murdering an eminent Catholic bishop. The case seems open and shut, as the boy was found covered in blood fleeing the scene - but as the victim's dark secrets and the defendant's psychological disorders come to light, things prove far from simple. Courtroom thriller, with Richard Gere, Edward Norton, Frances McDormand and Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Franklyn
programme.desc: Alternative worlds collide as the fates of four lost souls are intertwined across parallel universes. A man searches for his lost son in modern-day London, a masked vigilante pursues a murderous cult leader in the gothic metropolis of Meanwhile City, an artist's obsession with suicide takes a dangerous turn and a heartbroken man seeks a route back to the purity of his first love. Fantasy drama, starring Ryan Phillippe, Eva Green, Sam Riley, Bernard Hill and Art Malik.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Children's animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Step Up 4: Miami Heat
programme.desc: An aspiring dancer comes to Miami to pursue her dreams, and falls in love with the leader of a street performance crew. When she learns the group's neighbourhood is to be demolished, driving the residents from their homes, she joins forces with them to organise a protest show. Dance drama sequel, starring Kathryn McCormick and Ryan Guzman.

programme.title: Arrietty
programme.desc: A family of tiny people lives beneath the floorboards of a Tokyo house, scavenging from the human occupants and carefully maintaining an invisible profile. However, when their daughter is spotted by a boy staying there, the friendship that develops raises the dangerous possibility of other humans finding out about them. Animated fantasy based on The Borrowers, with the voices of Saoirse Ronan and Tom Holland.

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: Manic mechanoid Johnny Five meets an old friend in New York City and embarks on a fact-finding tour - but ends up entangled in a series of escapades culminating in a bank robbery. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Fisher Stevens, Michael McKean, Cynthia Gibb and Jack Weston, with the voice of Tim Blaney.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The teenage detective and his future sidekick Watson meet for the first time at boarding school. The death of Holmes's mentor sets the youngsters on their first case, and they discover that former members of an archaeological survey team have died under suspicious circumstances - pointing to a sinister Egyptian cult using hallucinogenic poisons to kill its victims. Adventure, starring Nicholas Rowe, Alan Cox and Sophie Ward.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: Premiere. A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.

programme.title: Killing Ground
programme.desc: Sam and Ian decide to spend the new year camping at a national park in the Outback, and find a beautiful, secluded spot, but notice another tent is already pitched there. They check it out and realise there must have been a violent disturbance and when they later discover a frightened toddler wandering alone in the woods it is not long before they find themselves thrust into a terrifying battle for survival. Australian horror, starring Harriet Dyer and Ian Meadows.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: A Mayan tribesman is captured by enemy warriors and taken to their city to be offered as a human sacrifice. However, he makes a desperate escape and plunges into the jungle in a fraught bid to free his pregnant wife and children from an underground cave. Meanwhile, his captors pursue him and there are omens of impending doom all around. Mel Gibson's historical adventure, with Rudy Youngblood and Dalia Hernandez. In Yucatec Maya.

programme.title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
programme.desc: An elderly bamboo cutter finds a tiny princess in a glowing shoot, little realising she will grow up to be a beautiful, strong-willed woman. After receiving several marriage proposals, she sets her suitors a variety of challenges in an attempt to learn which of them deserves to win her heart. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Chloe Grace Moretz, James Caan and Mary Steenburgen.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: An orphan lives in the walls of a 1930s railway station, hiding from the inspector who would send him to an orphanage. He scours the station for parts to complete a clockwork robot belonging to his father, a quest which leads him to uncover a lonely shopkeeper's mysterious past. Martin Scorsese's family adventure, starring Asa Butterfield, Chloe Grace Moretz and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: Following the death of his inventor father, a teenager finds plans for a time-travel device. He and his friends decide to build it, and together they embark on an amazing adventure back in time - but soon discover the perils of altering history. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Sam Lerner.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: Rec 3: Genesis
programme.desc: A couple's wedding day takes a grim turn when some of the guests display signs of a strange illness. They are soon falling prey to a disease that turns people into bloodthirsty maniacs. In the ensuing carnage, the bride and groom are separated and face a desperate struggle to find each other. Horror sequel, starring Leticia Dolera and Diego Martin. In Spanish and Catalan.(n)

programme.title: Little Norse Prince
programme.desc: A bold youngster living in Iron Age Scandinavia embarks on a series of increasingly dangerous adventures after he retrieves a priceless sword from a devious giant, ending up in the lands of his ancestors. Animated drama, featuring the voices of Etsuko Ichihara and Mikijiro Hira. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Moomins on the Riviera
programme.desc: The Moomins, Little My and Snorkmaiden embark on a sea journey that, after overcoming storms and desert island dangers, leads the family to the Riviera, where their unity is put to the test. Children's animation, with the voices of Russell Tovey and Tracy-Ann Oberman.(n)

programme.title: The Castle of Cagliostro
programme.desc: A globe-trotting gentleman thief pulls off a major robbery - only to discover he has netted a haul of counterfeit currency. Furious, he sets out to track down the crook responsible, but ends up battling against a master criminal with a devilish, power-mad plan. Animated adventure from Spirited Away director Hayao Miyazaki, with the voices of Bob Bergen and Michael McConnohie.(n)

programme.title: Catch That Kid
programme.desc: A plucky teenager racks her brains to think of a way of financing an operation for her father who was injured in a mountaineering accident, and eventually comes up with a daring plan to rob a bank with the help of friends. Comedy adventure, starring Kristen Stewart, Corbin Bleu, Max Thieriot and Jennifer Beals.(n)

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A Miami street dancer faces a series of setbacks as he seeks his fortune in Hollywood. He assembles a team of dancers which prove successful in a reality TV contest broadcast from Las Vegas, but struggles to put aside old conflicts in the pursuit of his dreams. Fifth film in the dance drama series, starring Ryan Guzman and Briana Evigan.(n)

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Singleton Jane is literally always the bridesmaid and never the bride, a role she assumes for the 28th time when her sister announces she is getting married - to a man Jane is secretly in love with. As she wrestles with her feelings, Jane's predicament attracts the attention of a reporter fascinated by her story. Romantic comedy, starring Katherine Heigl, James Marsden and Malin Akerman.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Premiere. Hedge-fund manager Seok-woo sets off on a train journey with his small daughter, but as their train is about to leave the station a very sick passenger stumbles aboard - affected by a chemical spill that turns creatures and people into zombies. The virus spreads fast from carriage to carriage, and Seok-woo must join with other unaffected passengers and fight to save his own life and that of his child. South Korean horror, starring Yoo Gong.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy reads Adolf Hitler's book Mein Kampf, and causes uproar when he plans to publish excerpts in the newspaper so the townsfolk will be aware of what is happening in the world.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A mysterious presence moving through the night strikes fear in the hearts of the Walton's Mountain residents, disrupting plans for a dance.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.desc: A teacher working in a rough neighbourhood befriends a troubled youth and soon realises he is her son, who was kidnapped as an infant 15 years previously. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd and Scott Bairstow.

programme.desc: The story of small time criminal Albert De Salvo, who falsely confessed to being the strangler that wreaked havoc in Boston during the early sixties. Starring David Faustino.

However, he soon realises his actions have placed his small time crook brother and cousin in danger. Thriller, starring James Marsden, Dennis Hopper, Giovanni Ribisi and Piper Perabo.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student Dr David Spencer and they start planning the wedding. However, her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for new town doctor Curtis Willard, and she begins to have second thoughts.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family recalls past Christmas celebrations while trapped by a sudden snowstorm. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert and Michael Landon.

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.title: Broken Lullaby
programme.desc: Inspired by a childhood photograph of her aunt, a genealogist travels round Europe to uncover details of the wealthy relative's family history. Romantic mystery, starring Mel Harris, Rob Stewart, Oliver Tobias and Jennifer Dale.

programme.desc: A retired judge, mourning the loss of his wife, finds new purpose in life thanks to a fresh challenge involving an old friend. Sensitive drama, starring James Garner, Bill Cobbs, Judith Ivey and Laurence Fishburne.

Thriller, starring Lindsay Price, David Jones, Sadie LeBlanc, Niall Matter and Emma Stevens.

programme.desc: When a man's best friend unexpectedly has a fatal heart attack, he begins to suspect foul play - and when more men in seemingly good health start to die, he joins forces with a police officer in a race against time to get to the bottom of the mystery. Thriller, starring James Thomas, Victoria Sanchez and Charisma Carpenter.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Callan

Spy thriller based on the TV series, starring Edward Woodward, Eric Porter, Carl Mohner, Catherine Schell and Russell Hunter.

programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of an honest politician, whose reputation is being slandered by an unscrupulous rival. Ken Kercheval guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: US embassy worker Jan Lindsey is helped by Interpol agent Michael Hayden as she tries to prove herself innocent of a murder in the Greek islands. Thriller, starring Charles Dance and Alexandra Paul.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Caroline are shocked to discover Mary has accepted a proposal of marriage, but reluctantly give their consent. Pioneering drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

Years later, she tries to put her mistakes behind her, only to find that somebody wants her dead. Mystery, starring Melissa George and Ryan Scott Greene.(n)

programme.title: Living with the Enemy
programme.desc: A woman marries a widowed billionaire after a whirlwind romance, but is shocked to learn his first wife was murdered by kidnappers and that she will have to learn to live with elaborate security measures as a result. programme.title: A Few Good Men

Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: A Killer in the Family
programme.desc: A killer manages to con his three sons into helping him and his cellmate escape from prison - a move which lands them in the middle of a murder spree. Thriller based on a true story, starring Robert Mitchum, James Spader and Eric Stoltz.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy reads Adolf Hitler's book Mein Kampf, and causes uproar when he plans to publish excerpts in the newspaper so the townsfolk will be aware of what is happening in the world.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A mysterious presence moving through the night strikes fear in the hearts of the Walton's Mountain residents, disrupting plans for a dance.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children make jokes about a new student's weight, but fail to understand how much they are upsetting him. Nancy takes advantage of his affection for her by making him her slave.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson is tricked by a salesman into thinking she can get rich quick by converting her family restaurant into a fast-food franchise.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: When she and Owen got their marriage licence, Syd begins to feel guilty about kissing Dr Baylor.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd misses her wedding shower, while Owen is invited to spend Thanksgiving with the Hansens.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to change the rules at a women's prison to allow the inmates greater access to their children.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to convince an ageing rancher that he is not too old to work with horses. Richard Farnsworth (The Straight Story) guest stars.

programme.title: Love's Unfolding Dream
programme.desc: A woman in 19th-century America aspires to be a doctor and her dreams seem to come true when she nurses a wealthy socialite who offers to pay for her to enrol at medical school. However, an unexpected encounter with a handsome lawyer forces her to reconsider what she really wants. Period drama, starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Nancy Linehan Charles and Patrick Levis.

programme.title: There Was a Little Boy
programme.desc: A teacher working in a rough neighbourhood befriends a troubled youth and soon realises he is her son, who was kidnapped as an infant 15 years previously. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd and Scott Bairstow.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma finally returns home after her stroke, but everyone is so protective of her that she no longer feels she is needed or has a place in the family.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles is badly injured while walking in the woods with Laura, and only a blind man can save their lives. Guest starring Burl Ives.

programme.title: Crimes of Passion
programme.desc: A married corporate employee enlists the aid of a colleague he is having an affair with to con their bosses out of millions with a fake sexual harassment case. However, they find themselves facing blackmail when their scheme is uncovered by a private investigator. Thriller, starring Dina Meyer, Jonathan Higgins and John H Brennan.

programme.title: No Surrender
programme.desc: A writer becomes a celebrated public heroine for her work encouraging women not to stay in violent relationships. She receives messages from a crazed stalker who is plotting to kill her, and begins to suspect the culprit may be dangerously close to home. Thriller, starring Mena Suvari and Stephanie Bauder.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Boston Strangler: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of small time criminal Albert De Salvo, who falsely confessed to being the strangler that wreaked havoc in Boston during the early sixties. Starring David Faustino.

programme.title: 10th and Wolf
programme.desc: The son of a Pennsylvania mobster is determined not to follow in his father's footsteps, and instead joins the army, serving in the first gulf war. When he impulsively steals a jeep at the end of the conflict, the FBI offer him a way out of paying for his crime - go back to his old neighbourhood and infiltrate the Sicilian crime syndicate taking over the drug trade in the city. However, he soon realises his actions have placed his small time crook brother and cousin in danger. Thriller, starring James Marsden, Dennis Hopper, Giovanni Ribisi and Piper Perabo.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student Dr David Spencer and they start planning the wedding. However, her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for new town doctor Curtis Willard, and she begins to have second thoughts.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student, but her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for the new town doctor.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family recalls past Christmas celebrations while trapped by a sudden snowstorm. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert and Michael Landon.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A semi-wild dog that loves James but hates Charles brings fear and gratitude into their lives.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie loses Leo's trust when she lets out a secret on radio.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A tornado strikes, interrupting Syd and Owen's final wedding preparations and events soon take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark makes a mistake that jeopardises the career of an undercover cop investigating drug dealing in a high school.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan spends Christmas trying to persuade a couple to save their marriage for their son's sake. Guest starring Wendie Malick.

programme.title: Broken Lullaby
programme.desc: Inspired by a childhood photograph of her aunt, a genealogist travels round Europe to uncover details of the wealthy relative's family history. Romantic mystery, starring Mel Harris, Rob Stewart, Oliver Tobias and Jennifer Dale.

programme.title: Decoration Day
programme.desc: A retired judge, mourning the loss of his wife, finds new purpose in life thanks to a fresh challenge involving an old friend. Sensitive drama, starring James Garner, Bill Cobbs, Judith Ivey and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Christmas is coming and the children are stranded as a blizzard strikes Walnut Grove.

programme.title: Secrets of the Summer House
programme.desc: A woman moves into her husband's family home after the death of her father-in-law, dismissing rumours that the property is cursed. However, when her spouse is involved in a near-fatal accident, she resolves to uncover the truth behind the mystery. Thriller, starring Lindsay Price, David Jones, Sadie LeBlanc, Niall Matter and Emma Stevens.

programme.title: Flirting with Danger
programme.desc: When a man's best friend unexpectedly has a fatal heart attack, he begins to suspect foul play - and when more men in seemingly good health start to die, he joins forces with a police officer in a race against time to get to the bottom of the mystery. Thriller, starring James Thomas, Victoria Sanchez and Charisma Carpenter.

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Callan
programme.desc: A former government hitman is persuaded to return to duty to kill a German businessman, supposedly involved in arms smuggling and terrorism. However, the assassin soon begins to wonder if his superiors are telling him everything. Spy thriller based on the TV series, starring Edward Woodward, Eric Porter, Carl Mohner, Catherine Schell and Russell Hunter.

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy raises money to save his newspaper by selling his land to a mining company, unaware of the damage the new owners will do to the environment.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob helps Ike fix his motorcycle, and wants to use it to enter a race, to Olivia's horror.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura's determination to save a new orchard from the ravages of drought puts her unborn child's life in danger. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A present-day couple buy an antique, folding-leaf table with a large letter I branded on it and are curious to learn about its origins. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A hostage situation at the ER breaks out spoiling Syd and Owen's marital bliss.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Four orphaned brothers face being split up when a social worker places them in different foster homes.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of an honest politician, whose reputation is being slandered by an unscrupulous rival. Ken Kercheval guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: US embassy worker Jan Lindsey is helped by Interpol agent Michael Hayden as she tries to prove herself innocent of a murder in the Greek islands. Thriller, starring Charles Dance and Alexandra Paul.(n)

programme.title: King of the World
programme.desc: The early career of boxer Muhammad Ali, then known as Cassius Clay, as he prepares for a title fight against Sonny Liston, while struggling to come to terms with his private and public personas. Biopic, starring Terrence Howard, Steve Harris, Gary Dourdan and John Ventimiglia.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Caroline are shocked to discover Mary has accepted a proposal of marriage, but reluctantly give their consent. Pioneering drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: A reporter interviews a suspect in a serial killer case whom she believes to be innocent - but he turns out to be guilty and her actions give him the chance to kill again. Years later, she tries to put her mistakes behind her, only to find that somebody wants her dead. Mystery, starring Melissa George and Ryan Scott Greene.(n)

programme.title: Living with the Enemy
programme.desc: A woman marries a widowed billionaire after a whirlwind romance, but is shocked to learn his first wife was murdered by kidnappers and that she will have to learn to live with elaborate security measures as a result. However, the more she gets to know her husband, the more she begins to suspect he is concealing the truth about her predecessor's fate. Thriller, with Sarah Lancaster and Mark Humphrey.(n)

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sits on the US Supreme Court or claimed victory in Brown v. Board of Education, Thurgood Marshall (Chadwick Boseman) is a young rabble-rousing attorney for the NAACP. Marshall explores one his greatest challenges in those early days: the case of black chauffeur Joseph Spell (Sterling K. Brown), accused by his white employer, Eleanor Strubing (Kate Hudson), of sexual assault and attempted murder.

programme.title: Who Is America?: 103
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation.

programme.title: The Debt
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Helen Mirren and Sam Worthington star in the story of Rachel Singer (Mirren), a former Mossad agent who endeavored to capture and bring to trial a notorious Nazi war criminal in a secret Israeli mission that ended with his death on the streets of East Berlin. Now, 30 years later, a man claiming to be the doctor has surfaced, and Rachel must go back to Eastern Europe to uncover the truth. Directed by Academy Award nominee John Madden.

programme.title: Mueller Probe
programme.desc: Our Cartoon President struggles to keep his disloyal staff from cooperating with Robert Mueller while Karen Pence worries that her husband's Mar-a-Lago trip changed him forever.(c)

programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sits on the US Supreme Court or claimed victory in Brown v. Board of Education, Thurgood Marshall (Chadwick Boseman) is a young rabble-rousing attorney for the NAACP. Marshall explores one his greatest challenges in those early days: the case of black chauffeur Joseph Spell (Sterling K. Brown), accused by his white employer, Eleanor Strubing (Kate Hudson), of sexual assault and attempted murder.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: A vengeful game of one-upmanship turns deadly in this urban thriller about a hotshot young attorney (Ben Affleck) and a recovering alcoholic (Samuel L. Jackson) whose minor fender-bender devastates both of their lives and quickly leads to an escalating war of dirty tricks and manipulation. William Hurt, Toni Collette, Dylan Baker, Amanda Peet and Sydney Pollack costar in this provocative, acclaimed film from director Roger Michell ("Notting Hill").

programme.title: Home Of The Brave
programme.desc: Three soldiers returning home to Spokane, Washington from the Iraq War find the adjustment back to normal life anything but smooth in this heartbreaking drama starring Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Biel, Brian Presley, Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, Jeff Nordling and Christina Ricci.

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Soul Men
programme.desc: Estranged backup singers reluctantly embark on a trip to New York where they are to perform in honor of their late band leader, but long-simmering resentments and grudges threaten to scuttle their reunion in this comedy drama starring Samuel L. Jackson and Bernie Mac with Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper (Jon Favreau) suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant after refusing to compromise his creative integrity, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife (Sofia Vergara), his friend (John Leguizamo) and his son (Emjay Anthony) to launch a food truck. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen for life.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: Who Is America?: 103
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation.

programme.title: Waiting
programme.desc: The waiters at a theme restaurant face a long night of dealing with their obnoxious customers, a crazed chef, a controlling boss, as well as their own thwarted ambitions and stalled romances in this workplace comedy starring Justin Long, Ryan Reynolds, Anna Faris, Luis Guzman and David Koechner.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper (Jon Favreau) suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant after refusing to compromise his creative integrity, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife (Sofia Vergara), his friend (John Leguizamo) and his son (Emjay Anthony) to launch a food truck. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen for life.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Thomas Jane ("Deep Blue Sea," "Dreamcatcher") steps into the steel-tipped boots of Marvel Comics hero Frank Castle, a.k.a. The Punisher, a crusading vigilante out to topple the crime czar (John Travolta) who murdered his family. Rebecca Romijn, Ben Foster, Samantha Mathis, Roy Scheider and Will Patton costar in this crackling adaptation from writer/director Jonathan Hensleigh ("Jumanji," "Armageddon").

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: Dean
programme.desc: Demetri Martin plays an illustrator who falls hard for an LA woman (Gillian Jacobs) while trying to prevent his father (Kevin Kline) from selling the family home in the wake of his mother's death.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: New high school student Cameron (Gordon-Levitt) is smitten with Bianca (Oleynik), but in order to get around her father's strict rules on dating, he must get bad boy Patrick (Ledger) to date Bianca's ill-tempered sister, Kat (Stiles).

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar® winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation.

programme.desc: Frank has some settlement money coming his way but needs his ex-wife's signature on the documents; Debbie learns that Steve may not be who he says he is; Fiona is enraged when Monica shows up and announces she's taking baby Liam with her.(n)

programme.title: Just Another Immigrant: Romesh at the Greek
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan, a successful comedian in England, moves his entire family to Los Angeles to pursue his lifelong dream of making it as a stand-up comedian in America. He then takes the drastic, and possibly foolish, step of performing his first ever U.S. stand-up show at the six-thousand seat historic Greek Theater.(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in this lavish historical drama as German aristocrat Claus von Stauffenberg, a formerly loyal Nazi officer who begins to question his country's motivations and tactics in World War II then hatches a dangerous plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler. Bill Nighy and Kenneth Branagh costar in this fact-based thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: Freeway
programme.desc: Vanessa Lutz is a teenage juvenile delinquent living with her prostitute mother and perverted stepfather. Attempting to flee her life, she leaves to go live with her grandmother. While on her way, she meets Bob Wolverton, a charming yet sadistic serial killer. Fearing for her life, she attempts to kill Bob, but only severely disfigures him. Vanessa is sent to prison due to a lack of evidence. Now she must escape and clear her name before he can strike again.(n)

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: An ex-convict who is desperate to pay off his debts schemes to rob his wealthy employer's home, unaware that the place is rigged with a series of fiendishly deadly traps. Josh Stewart, Michael Reilly Burke and Andrea Roth star in this clever horror thriller.

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: When a prominent politician and a beautiful young woman vanish inside a London subway station, Scotland Yard's Inspector Calhoun investigates and makes a horrifying discovery. Not only did a group of 19th century tunnel workers survive a cave-in, but they lived for years in a secret underground enclave by consuming the flesh of their own dead. Now the lone descendant of this grisly tribe has surfaced, prowling the streets for fresh victims and a new mate.

programme.title: Jackals
programme.desc: When Justin Powell (Ben Sullivan) is captured by two ski-masked men and dragged back to a secluded cabin, it's anything but a standard kidnapping. Waiting for Justin at the cabin are his father (Johnathon Schaech) mother (Deborah Kara Unger), brother (Nick Roux) and former girlfriend (Chelsea Ricketts). Together, they attempt to free him from the sinister brainwashing he's undergone at the hands of a vicious cult known as The Jackals.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her.

programme.title: The Prowler
programme.desc: An unknown killer, clad in World War II US Army fatigues, stalks a sleepy New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35-year-old double murder, which leads him back to the scene of the crime at the college spring dance.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions.

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley.

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage and Ron Perlman star in this adventure about a heroic Crusader and his fellow soldier who must transport a woman accused of being a witch to a remote monastery. The journey across perilous terrain tests their strength and courage as they discover the girl's secret and find themselves battling a powerful force that will determine the fate of the world.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Marc and Fred go to war when they are refused a double bed at a Christian B&B. They win their court case and go back. Triumph turns to terror when a Russian neo-Nazi checks in. Their weekend of fun becomes a bloody battle.(n)

programme.title: Jackals
programme.desc: When Justin Powell (Ben Sullivan) is captured by two ski-masked men and dragged back to a secluded cabin, it's anything but a standard kidnapping. Waiting for Justin at the cabin are his father (Johnathon Schaech) mother (Deborah Kara Unger), brother (Nick Roux) and former girlfriend (Chelsea Ricketts). Together, they attempt to free him from the sinister brainwashing he's undergone at the hands of a vicious cult known as The Jackals.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: A pair of horny American college students on a backpacking trip across Europe stumble into a hellish nightmare of murder for profit in this horror smash from director Eli Roth ("Cabin Fever"), starring Jay Hernandez and Derek Richardson, with Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova, Jan Vlasak, Jana Kaderabkova and Jennifer Lim.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought.(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.(n)

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth.(n)

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.(n)

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: When a prominent politician and a beautiful young woman vanish inside a London subway station, Scotland Yard's Inspector Calhoun investigates and makes a horrifying discovery. Not only did a group of 19th century tunnel workers survive a cave-in, but they lived for years in a secret underground enclave by consuming the flesh of their own dead. Now the lone descendant of this grisly tribe has surfaced, prowling the streets for fresh victims and a new mate.(n)

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life.(n)

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: When six strangers with unspeakable pasts wake up imprisoned in an abandoned warehouse, they discover they are being forced to participate in an evil experiment. Five of them must die, only one can live and they have two hours to decide amongst themselves who survives. The clock is ticking and if they don't decide, they will all die.(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: In an extremely rare decision, the Catholic Church officially recognized the demonic possession of Emily Rose, a 19-year-old Minnesota college freshman. An exorcism was performed and recorded, and that recording played a pivotal role in the events that followed. Told in terrifying flashbacks, this film chronicles the haunting trial of the priest accused of criminal negligence resulting in the death of the young girl believed to be possessed. Starring Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: The Recused
programme.desc: Forced by her relationship with Hank to recuse herself as his lawyer, Abby pitches the case to a senior partner on the golf course; Hank is dismayed by Karen's growing relationship with artist Ben; Marcy and Stu ask Charlie to help them pitch a TV project.

programme.title: Lights. Camera. A**hole
programme.desc: Hank takes a gig rewriting dialogue on a zombie sequel but threatens his job when he hooks up with a sexy woman with close ties to the film's female lead; Marcy tells Stu she's pregnant but not that the baby may be Charlie's.

programme.title: Life During Wartime
programme.desc: One sister is a bitter screenwriter, another meets an older man she hopes will give structure to her disordered life, and a third must deal with a child-molesting ex-husband who has been paroled from jail and wants to reconcile with their son. Allison Janney, Ally Sheedy and Shirley Henderson star in this dysfunctional family drama from director Todd Solondz, a sequel to his earlier film "Happiness" that casts new actors in the same roles.

programme.title: Bad Girl
programme.desc: Amy must fight to save her adoptive parents from their self-styled vengeful blood daughter, Chloe.

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door.

programme.title: Slow Burn (2007)
programme.desc: A district attorney who's running for mayor suddenly finds himself embroiled in a case of murder and financial corruption in this edgy thriller starring Ray Liotta, LL Cool J, Jolene Blalock, Mekhi Phifer, Taye Diggs and Chewitel Ejiofor.

programme.title: XTC: This is Pop
programme.desc: Emerging from the late 1970s punk and new wave explosion, XTC amasses a devoted following with hit singles like 'Making Plans For Nigel' and 'Mayor Of Simpleton'. Presenting a journey into the world of the band, the film includes newly filmed interviews with Andy Partridge, Colin Moulding, Dave Gregory and Terry Chambers. Through a mixture of animation, archive and specially-shot sequences, the film explores the minds of principle songwriters, Partridge and Moulding.

programme.title: New Wave: Dare to be Different
programme.desc: In August, 1982, a small group of radio visionaries at WLIR Long Island knew they couldn't compete with the mega radio stations in New York City. With one brave decision, they changed the sound of radio forever. Program Director Denis McNamara, the crew at the station and the biggest artists of the era tell the story of how they battled the FCC, the record labels, mega-radio and all the conventional rules to create a musical movement that brought the New Wave to America - including bands like U2, Talking Heads, Depeche Mode and Blondie.

programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: Framed in a multimillion-dollar laundering scheme, upstanding investment banker Daryl (Orlando Jones) suddenly finds himself running from the FBI and swapping identities with petty thief Freddy (Eddie Griffin). As he dashes for the Mexican border in search of the one man who can clear his name, Daryl discovers his new alias is even more wanted than he is.

programme.title: All Styles
programme.desc: A young hip hop artist is rejected by his old dance crew for heading off to college before a major competition. As a result, he assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former friends.

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life.

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.

programme.title: Another Perfect Day
programme.desc: Evicted from his apartment, Hank moves back in with Karen and Becca while he prepares for his trial and teaches his daughter to drive; while Karen's out on a date with Ben, Becca and Pearl steal the Porsche and wreck it.(c)

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: A nervous Hank discovers that he's got good reason to panic when his trial turns into an all-out character assassination, with even friendly witnesses Charlie and Karen unable to portray him as anything other than a drunken, oversexed lout.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller.

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.

programme.title: Starring Samuel Beckett, Albert Camus and Dr. Alois Alzheimer
programme.desc: The day after his 44th birthday, Thom Payne comes under pressure to rebrand himself after his agency hires a pair of young Swedish creative directors to evolve the company (skinny jeans are an option). Meanwhile, Dani, a headhunter, advises Thom to admit he's hit his joy ceiling. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).
